data.subject: Everywhere (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Can you hear me calling
 Out your name
 You know that I'm falling
 And I don't know what to say
 I'l

data.subject: Seven Wonders (Remastered)
data.lyric:
So long ago
 Certain place
 Certain time
 You touched my hand
 All the way
 All the way down to Emmi

data.subject: Big Love (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Looking out for love
 In the night so still
 Oh I'll build you a kingdom
 In that house on the hill
